title.rendered: PEJA and KOLAŠIN Tourism-Accommodation Entities got the International EcoLabel Certified

content.rendered:
𝐄𝐂𝐎𝐋𝐀𝐁𝐄𝐋 𝐂𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 is an internationally recognized Standard that enables the certified entities to improve their sustainability of their businesses across every aspect of the five covered criteria, using global best practice criteria. It assures tourists, travelers and consumers that services are backed by a strong, well-managed commitment to sustainable practices and provide high quality nature-based tourism experiences.

  • Business Management and Operation Planning
  • Infrastructure and Utility Efficiency Management
  • Credibility and Customer Satisfaction
  • Recognition, brand identity and Responsible Marketing
  • Working with Local Community and Cultural Heritage
